about_the_game:
In the year 2045, humanity stands on the brink of unprecedented technological advancements and looming threats. Amidst this uncertain future, a clandestine organization has developed a top-secret VR training program known as Nexus Protocol. This program is designed to prepare an elite cadre of soldiers for the battles that lie ahead.

As a recruit in this covert initiative, you will enter a highly realistic virtual reality environment where you will face a series of intense combat scenarios. From alien landscapes to high-tech space stations, each level is meticulously crafted to challenge your skills and strategic thinking. Your mission: to master advanced weaponry, tactics, and alien technology.

The Nexus Protocol is more than just a training program—it's a proving ground. Your performance in these simulations will determine your readiness to defend humanity against emerging threats. Every decision you make, every move you execute, will be crucial in shaping your future as an elite soldier.

Your journey through the Nexus Protocol will test your limits and push you to the edge. Are you ready to step into the unknown, master the simulation, and become humanity’s last line of defense?

Join the program. Master the Nexus. Define the Protocol.

Game Features:

  • Dynamic Combat: Engage in fast-paced, heart-pounding combat with a vast array of futuristic weapons and gadgets. Each encounter demands quick reflexes and tactical thinking.
  • Stunning Sci-Fi Environments: Explore breathtaking alien landscapes, advanced space stations, and dystopian cityscapes within the VR program. Every level is meticulously designed to offer both beauty and challenge.
  • Challenging Levels: Complete 8 meticulously crafted levels, each designed to push your skills to the limit. Face off against simulated rival factions, hostile alien species, and rogue AI.
  • Performance Tracking: Track your progress with detailed statistics. The game stores your completion time for each level and displays it in the level select menu, allowing you to strive for better performance and faster completion times.
  • Immersive Soundscape: Experience the intensity of battle with a fully immersive audio environment. Realistic sound effects and a powerful soundtrack bring the sci-fi world to life, enhancing every moment of gameplay.

content_descriptors.notes:
Nexus Protocol contains mature content that may not be suitable for all players. This includes:

Violence: The game features intense combat scenarios with realistic depictions of violence, including the use of firearms and futuristic weapons. Players will engage in battles against simulated enemy forces, resulting in blood and gore.

Please note that Nexus Protocol does not contain any depictions of nudity, drug use, sexual acts, sexual assault, non-consensual sex, or self-harm.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: core i5 8-gen or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia gtx 1050TI
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: i5-12450H or equivalent
  • Memory: 10 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
